name: CodeDrill Single Image Upload
author: Pankaj Sharma

sections.description: This plugin will allow to upload an image as attachment. And you will get attachment id of the image. Shortcode: [CD_Single_IMAGE_UPLOAD]. It will create thumbnails as defined in wordpress configuration.
sections.installation:
Upload the CodeDrill Single Image Upload plugin to your blog, Activate it. you can use [CD_Single_IMAGE_UPLOAD] to check the demo. It will automatically create a page with name “Upload Page Demo”

1, 2, 3: You’re done!
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

Upload the CodeDrill Single Image Upload plugin to your blog, Activate it. you can use [CD_Single_IMAGE_UPLOAD] to check the demo. It will automatically create a page with name “Upload Page Demo”

1, 2, 3: You’re done!

short_description: This plugin will allow to upload an image as attachment. And you will get attachment id of the image.  Shortcode: [CD_Single_IMAGE_UPLOAD].
